Name: Super Credit Arrows
Description: Puts arrows above Super Credit piles.

Options.Name: Arrow Colour and Glow
Options.Description: Sets arrow colour and if it's glowing or not.

SubOptions.Name: Blue Glowing
SubOptions.Description: Makes the arrow blue and glowing.

SubOptions.Name: Blue No Glowing
SubOptions.Description: Makes the arrow blue and not glowing.

SubOptions.Name: Purple Glowing
SubOptions.Description: Makes the arrow purple and glowing.

SubOptions.Name: Purple No Glowing
SubOptions.Description: Makes the arrow purple and not glowing.
